snippet: Many countries just use their tournaments as secondary revenue streams for clubs, but England has used its tournament to produce 141 years of magical memories.
abstract: Bob Hughes On Soccer column says many countries just use their FA Cup soccer tournaments as secondary revenue streams for clubs, but England has used its tournament to produce 141 years of magical memories.
lead_paragraph: Many countries just use their tournaments as secondary revenue streams for clubs, but England has used its tournament to produce 141 years of magical memories.

headline.main: For Many, a Tournament of Big Dreams
